title: Fusion
description: An alloy mod for SimpleOres and add-ons.
body:
Fusion is the alloy add-on for SimpleCore/Simple Ores2. It adds steel (and steel items) and the fusion furnace (an alloy furnace); from Simple Ores 2, it adds 3 more alloys and items made from them: bronze, thyrium and sinisite. Fusion recycling, from **akkamaddi's Addenda** (formerly **Simple Fusion Recycling**), was merged into Fusion around Minecraft 1.14.4/1.15 or so.


For Minecraft Forge 1.16.3 and later, SimpleCoreLib is required.  
For Minecraft Forge 1.14 through 1.16.1, Simple Ores2 is required.  
SimpleCore API is no longer required for Minecraft 1.12.2 or earlier.  

![Blocks](https://cdn-raw.modrinth.com//data/8K8WPv8S/images/44693c380c61d4acf8e8954027753e4b21f888c9.jpg)  
 Please see [the original Minecraft Forum post](http://www.minecraftforum.net/forums/mapping-and-modding/minecraft-mods/1279863-simpleores-2-by-alexndrthegr8st) for information. Or the wiki.

Automation notes by side:

* Top: inserts into catalyst slot
* Bottom: extracts from output slot
* Back, Front: inserts into fuel slot.
* Left: inserts into left input slot
* Right: inserts into right input slot

 ![Fusion Armors and Weapons](https://cdn-raw.modrinth.com//data/8K8WPv8S/images/05b28665acf82ca2f1cc62986ea3af2d24669e07.jpg)
